message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I am extending to you the chance to own it at a special price of $950,000. This offer is designed to be mutually beneficial, allowing you to secure this valuable asset at a discount while ensuring I receive a fair return for my investment. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
